title: Roy Greenslade: Korean journalists stage media law protest
content: There is growing concern among Korean journalists about the probability of the country's three giant newspaper groups being allowed to acquire broadcasting outlets. More than 100 journalists held a protest in Seoul on Monday in opposition to government proposals to allow cross-media ownership. (Via Hankyoreh)
summary:
There is growing concern among Korean journalists about the probability of the country's three giant newspaper groups being allowed to acquire broadcasting outlets.
More than 100 journalists held a protest in Seoul on Monday in opposition to government proposals to allow cross-media ownership.
(Via Hankyoreh)
